blogs.title: Personal statement
blogs.body:
Dear Admissions Committee,
I am writing to express my interest in pursuing a Master of Science in Computer Science at Aston University. As a driven and enthusiastic individual with a passion for technology and its ability to improve our world, I am eager to continue my education and advance my skills in the field of computer science.
I have always been fascinated by the potential of technology to solve complex problems and make a positive impact on society. This passion led me to pick up software development as a skill, and contributed as a software developer in Cyphercrescent for four years. Through various projects, I have become proficient in programming languages such as C#, Javascript and Typescript and have a strong grasp of data structures and algorithms.
As a software developer, I also had the opportunity to work on a number of real-world projects, including developing a desktop application for oil well modelling for the oil and gas industry. These experiences have further fuelled my interest in computer science and solidified my desire to pursue a career in this field.
I am confident that a Master of Science in Computer Science at Aston University will provide me with the advanced knowledge and skills I need to achieve my goals. The program's focus on cutting-edge research and innovative technologies aligns perfectly with my interests and career aspirations. Furthermore, I am excited about the prospect of studying at Aston University, which is renowned for its world-class faculty and research facilities.
I am eager to contribute my enthusiasm and skills to the program and to collaborate with my fellow students and faculty on meaningful projects that will have a positive impact on society. I believe that the program's blend of theoretical knowledge and practical experience, combined with its strong focus on research, will provide me with the foundation I need to succeed in my career and make a meaningful difference in the world.
Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the opportunity to further discuss my qualifications and passion for computer science with you.
Sincerely,
[Your Name]
blogs.author: mario
